text: esources address the diagnosis or management of juvenile myoclonic epilepsy:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy with grand mal seizures on awakening  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, idiopathic generalized 10  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, idiopathic generalized 9  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, juvenile myoclonic 5  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, juvenile myoclonic 9  - Genetic Testing Registry: Juvenile myoclonic epilepsy  - Merck Manual Consumer Version: Seizure
